translation.onboarding1_p: Your AI-powered Tax Assistant built for UAE founders and freelancers.
translation.onboarding2_p: Upload invoices or salary slips, get instant tax insights and deadlines.
translation.onboarding3_p: Register now to track, file, and optimize taxes with AI.
translation.hero_title_yc: Stop Drowning in UAE Tax Complexity. Taxora.AI is Your AI Lifeline.
translation.hero_p_yc: The evolving UAE tax landscape (VAT & new Corporate Tax) creates significant hurdles for freelancers and SMEs. Taxora.AI delivers AI-powered automation and expert-level insights to simplify compliance, minimize risk, and save you precious time. Get ahead ‚Äì join our waitlist.
translation.video_section_subtitle_multiple_v3: Quick walkthroughs of our dashboard, estimators, and AI chat features.
translation.bento_title_yc: Why Taxora.AI? Your Smart Compliance Partner.
translation.feature1_desc_yc: Upload any document (PDF, image). Our AI instantly extracts data & categorizes for tax readiness, saving you hours.
translation.feature2_desc_yc: Trained on 1000s of official FTA documents for accurate, instant UAE tax answers.
translation.feature3_desc_yc: An intuitive dashboard for deadlines, compliance status, and AI-driven insights to keep your tax health optimal.
translation.f4desc: Input your earnings and let Taxora do the math.
translation.f5desc: License and structure advice for freelancers and startups.
translation.f6desc: Generate beautiful, audit-ready summaries in PDF or Excel.
translation.feature_deduction_advisor_desc_yc: Our AI flags potential Corporate Tax deductions from your expenses, ensuring you claim everything you're entitled to.
translation.feature_ct_simulator_desc_yc: Model business scenarios (hiring, expansion) & see the immediate impact on your Corporate Tax and Zakat obligations.
translation.feature_freezone_desc_yc: AI helps verify Qualifying Activities & Income, guiding you to maximize Free Zone tax benefits and stay compliant.
translation.feature_crossborder_desc_yc: Get instant insights on WHT, PE risks, and VAT for common cross-border transactions.

translation.traction_waitlist_text: UAE businesses & freelancers are already on our early access waitlist.
translation.faq1_a: Taxora.AI is designed for UAE-based freelancers, startups, and small to medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) looking to simplify their VAT, Zakat, and corporate tax compliance with an intelligent, AI-powered assistant.
translation.faq2_q: Is my data secure with Taxora.AI?
translation.faq2_a: Absolutely. Data security is our top priority. We use bank-level encryption (AES-256) for data in transit and at rest. Our platform is designed with privacy first, adhering to UAE data protection laws. We don't sell your data, and you own your information, always.
translation.faq3_q: When is Taxora.AI expected to launch?
translation.faq3_a: We are working hard to bring Taxora.AI to you soon! We are targeting a launch in Q4 2025. Join our waitlist to be the first to know and get exclusive early access.
translation.faq4_q_yc: What's your unique insight for Taxora.AI?
translation.faq4_a_yc: Our unique insight is that UAE tax compliance, while complex, can be made intuitive and proactive through AI specifically trained on local regulations and integrated with user-friendly tools. We empower users to understand and manage their taxes confidently, rather than just reactively filing.
translation.faq5_q: Can Taxora.AI help with international business?
translation.faq5_a: Yes! Taxora.AI includes a Cross-Border Tax Checker to help you understand potential tax implications for common international transactions, making it ideal for businesses with global connections.
translation.faq6_q: How does Taxora.AI handle Free Zone benefits?
translation.faq6_a: Our Free Zone Optimizer helps you maximize your benefits by cross-checking your activities against FTA rules for Qualifying Income (0% Corporate Tax) and can suggest license alignments for optimal compliance.
translation.expertise_desc: Taxora.AI isn't just smart algorithms. Our platform is built on cutting-edge AI, extensively trained on official UAE tax legislation and FTA documentation. This technological core is continuously refined and validated in consultation with seasoned UAE tax professionals and compliance advisors, ensuring you receive accurate, reliable, and context-aware assistance.
translation.trust_p: We understand you're trusting us with sensitive data. Our platform is architected with multi-layer security to ensure your information is always protected.
translation.trust1_desc: All data is encrypted in transit and at rest using AES-256, the same standard trusted by leading financial institutions.
translation.trust2_desc: Our AI models and compliance workflows are built and validated in partnership with certified UAE tax professionals.
translation.trust3_desc: We don't see your financial data. We don't sell data. You own your information, always. Compliant with UAE data protection laws.
translation.cta_title_yc: Stop Worrying About UAE Taxes. Start Growing Your Business.
